entry.title: Shop Max® Wipers (30 x 60s)
entry.summary:
Vendor: TORK
Type: Shop Towel
Price: 112.79

The Tork® Advanced ShopMax Wiper Roll Towels are strong enough to power through oil, grease, and solvents, yet versatile enough to be an ideal everyday solution for general cleanup and spills. Its thick, cloth-like construction is highly absorbent and low linting, making it an effective, convenient towel for shop, auto and home. These multipurpose disposable towels are an excellent replacement for cloth rags. Their durability and high-performance characteristics make them a perfect choice for a wide variety of uses, from detail work in professional shops and garages to cleaning tools in do-it-yourselfers' workshops and garages. This product contains 85% paper content (60% recycled, 40% postindustrial) and 15% synthetic emulsion.
  • Tough on grease, grime and dirt and versatile enough to be an ideal everyday solution for general cleanup and spills
  • Highly absorbent and low linting
  • Excellent replacement for cloth rags
Type All-Purpose
Width 11"
Colour White
Description Tork Advanced - Wipes
Ply 1
Sheets/roll 60
Sheets/case 30
Sold/priced per Case
Manufacture Code 450160

entry.title: PRO Tuff-Job® W922 - antimicrobial foodservice towels 1/4 fold - Blue (150ct)
entry.summary:
Vendor: CASCADES
Type: Wiper
Price: 62.30

These durable and machine washable foodservice towels are both absorbent and reusable and ideal for the professional kitchen. Designed to provide superior cleaning performance whether used dry or with harsh sanitizers or disinfecting solutions, these towels are easy to rinse clean and fast drying ensuring a long-lasting product. This blue colored towel assists in masking stains for a cleaner appearance and a seamless replacement for linen rental or cloth dish towels. Made with a protectant antimicrobial agent, which inhibits the growth of odor causing bacteria and mold for the life of the towel.

Colour  Blue
Dimensions 12 x 24 in (30.5 x 61 cm)
Fold 1/4 fold
Sheets/box 150

entry.title: Clorox® Healthcare® - Disinfecting Wipes (110ct Refill)
entry.summary:
Vendor: CLOROX
Type: Disinfectant Wipe
Price: 36.28

 Clorox® Wipes Disinfecting are great for cleaning and fighting bacteria & virus throughout your home. These disinfecting wipes kill 99.9% of bacteria, including cold and flu, Staph, Strep, E.coli, Salmonella & Listeria. Clorox® Wipes Disinfecting are easy to use and work on a variety of hard, nonporous surfaces, including mirrors and glass. The powerful cleaning technology dissolves kitchen grease and fights soap scum. For convenient cleaning and disinfecting, keep this canister in your kitchen or bathroom or at your desk at work. Use these wipes anywhere messes or dirt may build up. Clean and disinfect anytime with the convenience of Clorox® Wipes Disinfecting.

  • Kills 99.9% of viruses and bacteria
  • Kills cold and flu viruses, Staph, Strep, E.coli, Salmonella & Listeria
  • Clear-drying formula works on a variety of surfaces
  • Powerful cleaning technology fights kitchen grease and soap scum
Wipes/Canister 110

entry.title: Pro Select™ B140 - Jumbo Toilet Paper (12 x 1000')
entry.summary:
Vendor: CASCADES
Type: jumbo bathroom tissue
Price: 47.20

Cascades PRO Select™ jumbo toilet paper is the ideal choice for customers who want a strong and affordable bath tissue that still maintains quality. Made from 100% recycled fiber and Green Seal certified, this toilet paper will meet the needs of any of your environmentally concerned customers. Soft and reliable, high-traffic restrooms across industrial, foodservice, retail and schools will cover all bases with this jumbo toilet paper. This product is biodegradable and safe for plumbing and septic systems. This product meets the Green Seal™ Standard GS-1, based on chlorine-free processing, energy and water efficiency, and content of 100% recovered material with a minimum of 50% post-consumer material.

  • For use in high traffic areas
  • Made from 100% recycled fibres and 50% post-consumer recycled materials
  • Combines softness, strength and sparkling whiteness at a competitive price
  • Jumbo roll size requires fewer refills and reduces maintenance costs
  • Universal 3.3" core is designed to fit virtually all size jumbo tissue dispensers
  • Large rolls are hard to conceal, making them pilfer-proof
Dimensions 3.45 in x 1000'
Strength  2-Ply
Quantity 12 rolls x 1000'
Weight 22.2 lb (10.1 kg)
Manufacture Cascades
Brand PRO Select
Manufacture Code B140

entry.summary:
Vendor: FROST PRODUCTS

Front loading for easy service and maintenance.  All doors are hinged with full length stainless steel piano hinges.  Product shipped with protective plastic coating to be removed after installation.  Available with keyed tumbler lock to reduce pilferage and vandalism.
